entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 3:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 34 %
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight then changing to freezing rain overnight. Snow over northern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near noon. Snow over northern sections in the morning. Local snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
